modules.name: MTS-ESP MIDI To CV
modules.description: Converts MIDI from an external device to CV and gates with MTS-ESP tuning support

modules.name: MTS-ESP CV To MIDI
modules.description: Converts CV to MIDI and sends to an external device with MTS-ESP tuning support

modules.name: MTS-ESP Quantizer
modules.description: Quantize pitch CV to the global MTS-ESP tuning table

modules.name: Interval
modules.description: Transpose or bend pitch CV by any interval, defined either as an integer ratio or cents value.
